name: Skuttle
description:
Skuttle is a Project for a game jam so if it feels scuffed.... NO JUDGIES

Your goal is to dig to the bottom of the pit, collect the diamond at the bottom, and then ESCAPE. The skuttler will pursue you every step of the way. It can burrow it's way to you so be careful. Breaking Dark Grey blocks will speed the skuttler up.

NZgamer 
https://itch.io/profile/nzgamer

Collect gold to increase your score. My highscore is 256... think you can beat it?
